EmailTemplate.subject: Upgrade to Ovation Select Today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.constantaviation.com/]]>
Honeywell’s Ovation Select ® cabin management system is available today from Constant Aviation. With five locations conveniently placed across the United States, they’re ready to walk you through the upgrade, timing, costs and everything you’d ever want to know about Ovation Select.
So what are you waiting for? Contact Constant Aviation today to learn more about Honeywell’s Ovation Select CMS for Challenger 604.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Constant-Aviation_Ovation-Select.html]]>
